description: The State shall not deny to any person equality before the law or the equal protection of the laws within the territory of India.

law_name: Prohibition of discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex or place of birth
description: The State shall not discriminate against any citizen on grounds only of religion, race, caste, sex, place of birth or any of them.

law_name: Prohibition of discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex or place of birth
description: No citizen shall, on grounds only of religion, race, caste, sex, place of birth or any of them, be subject to any disability, liability, restriction or condition with regard to-/n(a) access to shops, public restaurants, hotels and places of public entertainment; or /n(b) the use of wells, tanks, bathing ghats, roads and places of public resort maintained wholly or partly out of State funds or dedicated to the use of the general public.
